actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Beast of Burden
special_abilities.desc: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

special_abilities.name: Sure-Footed
special_abilities.desc: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
